hero.introduction: A 20 year old Brazilian <1>Web and Salesforce</1> Sales Cloud Developer that takes the client needs and a nice work enviroment as a priority.

intro.description: Understand client needs and deliver <1>exceptional results.</1>

projects.title: Best Projects
projects.description: Over the past few years, I’ve primarily focused on a <1> tech stack that includes Node.js, React.js, and TailwindCSS </1>. I usualy incorporate external libraries such as Radix, Lucide Icons, Material Tailwind, and Sooner to ensure my <3> applications are as consistent and accessible </3> as possible. Take a look at what I’ve been up to!

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description1: Hey there! I'm a proactive and communicative Web/Salesforce <1>Brazilian Developer</1> and a passionate gamer with a growing love for programming.
intro.description2: I'm a Salesforce Administrator at Unimed Fortaleza and currently graduating in System Analysis and Development at UNIFOR.
intro.description3: As a Developer, I am constantly <1>seeking growth and improvement</1>, not just technically but also in all the social aspects of my work. My approach is to understand the <2>client's needs</2> and work collaboratively to deliver exceptional results.

certificates.title: Certificates
certificates.description: During my <1>journey</1>, I’ve earned a variaty of certificates in web development, Salesforce, and design. I firmly believe in the power of continuous learning—constantly <3>seeking new knowledge and refining my skills.</3> These certifications represent my <5>commitment to growth</5> and excellence in the ever-evolving world of technology.
